common.description: Observatory of the pre- and perinatal periods. Investigate with us the relationships between environmental pollution and maternal and neonatal health in Brazil in an interactive tool
Observatório dos períodos pré e perinatal. Investigue conosco as relações entre a poluição ambiental e a saúde materna e neonatal no Brasil em uma ferramenta interativa

posts.excerpt: Who's makimng it, what is the project, how it was developed and more on this institutional video
posts.title: Get to know Amplia Saúde

posts.excerpt: This workshop aimed to address a specific design challenge regarding how to view the temporal relationship between exposure of pregnant women to pollutants and neonatal outcomes
posts.title: First Big Data Visualization in Maternal and Neonatal Health Workshop

posts.title: Amplia Saúde's participation in UFRJ's Festival

posts.excerpt: International edition of the workshop aimed to identify caveats in the data used on the project, share knowledge and collect suggestions on next steps.
posts.title: How was our International Workshop on big data view on maternal & neonatal health and the environment
